title: For Sale:  Glock 30S (slim slide)  w/ Trijicon Night Sights
postcontent:
Up for sale is a Glock 30S which is a subcompact 45 ACP model, it is basically the same size as a Glock 19 and fits in holsters made for the 19.  This is basically a hybrid between the Glock 30 and the Glock 36.  It has the best of both worlds as it has a slimmer slide than the 30 and holds almost twice the capacity (10+1) of the Glock 36.  It uses a generation 3 slim/short frame but it has generation 4 recoil spring which is how it comes from the factory.  These pistols are pretty popular and I hardly ever see them at gun shops.  I have put about 500 rounds through it and it has been boring Glock reliable with any ammo including hollow points.  I am only selling it in order to get a larger Glock 21 or 41 also in 45 ACP.  
I would be willing to work out a trade for either of the previous two pistols (21 or 41, gen 4 preferred) I mentioned. It will come with two 10 round magazines, case, and cleaning brush/rod. I would also sell the Gun itself for $425 with trijicon night sights installed. I can be reached by email or text at 724seven146020. Thanks for viewing.

title: For Sale:  NRA commemorative 1911 Virginia 33 of 100
postcontent:
This 1911 comes with jewlers grade nickel plating and 24kt plating with engraving of historical wars that 1911 has been used in. Grips have  33 of 100 to match the Display case that also features the NRA and 33 of 100.Over the last century, the 1911 pistol has undeniably become one of the most dependable and effective firearms to date. Designed by John Browning in 1911, it is best known for its short recoil and slender design, and is popular among civilian shooters. Even the U.S. military has trusted it to be the sidearm for our troops since WWI.
 
It is because of this legacy that we decided to create the NRA 1911 pistol. During its 100th anniversary in 2011, American Legacy Firearms teamed up with the National Rifle Association and produced our first NRA licensed project.  Built on an Auto-Ordnance 1911A1 .45ACP, the NRA pistol is nickel plated and comes with beautiful maple grips. Engraved on the slides are maps of every conflict the 1911 has been involved in over the last 100 years. The artwork also commemorates the brave men and women who’ve served our country. A beautiful oak display box is included. With the edition number placed on the left grip, there will only be 100 made for each state. Several states have already sold out. Each sale helps support the NRA in their ongoing commitment to protecting our Second Amendment rights!

The SIG SAUER® Standard Adaptive Carbine Platform (ACP) allows any handgun with an accessory rail to be quickly modified into a personal defense weapon or carbine style firearm. Regardless of the brand, most pistols equipped with an accessory rail can be mounted to the ACP without the need for modification to the base gun.ACP will accept most railed guns with barrels up to 5" in length.The SIG SAUER® Enhanced Adaptive Carbine Platform (ACP) allows any handgun with an accessory rail (pistol barrel length must not exceed 5") to be quickly modified into a personal defense weapon or carbine style firearm. Regardless of the brand, most pistols equipped with an accessory rail can be mounted to the ACP without the need for modification to the base gun.This model includes the SIG SAUER Rail Mount Laser (CPL-RMR), a quick detachable sling swivel and a Single Point Bungee Sling.Fabricated from solid aircraft-grade aluminum, the ACP sports M1913 rails at the 3, 6 and 9 o’clockpositions with a full-length top rail at the 12 o’clock position. The ACP brings Personal Defense Weapon (PDW) features to almost any handgun.

This gun is in excellent condition with the shiniest bore I have ever seen in a Mauser. My apologies for the bore picture I couldn’t find a flashlight low enough in lumens to counteract how shiny and mirror like it is. The only blemish is where it was kept in a safe for over 50 years near the end of the barrel where the holder in the safe made contact. This rifle is All matching except for the scabbard which I Purchased separately to complete its ascetic look. I’m am asking 1000 OBO for both. title: For Sale/Trade:  Ruger Mini-14 Carbine Rifle stainless barrel with custom stock and 8 mags
postcontent:
Selling my Ruger Mini-14 Semi-Auto Range Rifle (.223/5.56).

It has a stainless steel barrel and originally came with a synthetic stock, which I replaced with a custom thumbhole wood stock.

The rifle also has an added barrel strut to enhance accuracy.  Note that as presently configured, it doesn't have a scope mount, but mounts are as cheap as $10 and simple to attach. 

It cycles very reliably and is very suitable for anything from ranch work to home defense.  It is also a very fun plinking rifle. With the scope mount, it becomes a great all-round rifle, or a good SHTF alternative to an AR. 

The mags are 20 round, 7 are black/blue (some show a bit of wear), one is stainless.

The rifle's MSRP is $1075 (though usually more like $800 retail), the strut is about $100, the stock is about $150, the leather sling $50, mags are about $30 each. So, new, we have about $1250 total. title: For Sale:  SALE! Sig Sauer ACP - Adaptive Carbine Platform with Laser and Single Point Sling
postcontent:
The SIG SAUER® Standard Adaptive Carbine Platform (ACP) allows any handgun with an accessory rail to be quickly modified into a personal defense weapon or carbine style firearm. Regardless of the brand, most pistols equipped with an accessory rail can be mounted to the ACP without the need for modification to the base gun.ACP will accept most railed guns with barrels up to 5" in length.The SIG SAUER® Enhanced Adaptive Carbine Platform (ACP) allows any handgun with an accessory rail (pistol barrel length must not exceed 5") to be quickly modified into a personal defense weapon or carbine style firearm. Regardless of the brand, most pistols equipped with an accessory rail can be mounted to the ACP without the need for modification to the base gun.This model includes the SIG SAUER Rail Mount Laser (CPL-RMR), a quick detachable sling swivel and a Single Point Bungee Sling.Fabricated from solid aircraft-grade aluminum, the ACP sports M1913 rails at the 3, 6 and 9 o’clockpositions with a full-length top rail at the 12 o’clock position. Compatible accessories such as lights, red dot sights and lasers can be mounted for additional functionality.
The ACP brings Personal Defense Weapon (PDW) features to almost any handgun.
This is not a firearm so no FFL is required - it can be shipped directly to you! This model is not legal in California.We have this in stock.  We will ship anywhere in the CONUSA for $25.  You must be legally allowed to own this firearm and you are responsible for knowing your own local laws. Thanks for looking!

title: For Sale:  RARE 581 Limited Edition Mini 14 Stainless/Laminate Excellent
postcontent:
For sale or trade is an excellent 581 series Mini 14 Ranch rifle which was a Davidson's Exclusive Limited Edition model no5858. Ruger doesn't make these any more! There is absolutely nothing wrong with the weapon, perfect operating condition. I really love this gun, no cheap plastics, just good, solid stainless steel and laminate. Perfect for hunting in less than ideal weather without any worries. I am willing to FTF or ship at buyer's expense.

It has less than 150 rounds through it so the magazines and the action aren't even fully broken in. Function has been 100% out of box with several types of 5.56 and .223 ammo. I never benched it out to 100 yards, but it is definitely more accurate than I am with iron sights.

The laminated stock is a very nice black/grey with a slight greenish tint to it. I believe it was made under contract by Revolution but is a slightly different pattern from their Explorer stocks.  I've made a few modifications to the stock for better ergonomics as it originally left much to be desired. The stock has a very few and very small handling marks, still in very good condition. It also has an excellent non-slip recoil pad.

Also included are two practically brand new Ruger factory magazines: one 20 rounder and one 30 rounder. Stainless steel scope rings, an upgraded handguard made by Choate for better ventilation and weight reduction, and three 5.56 dummy rounds by Magpul as an extra. 

Asking $800 cash, buyer pays shipping if applicable.

title: For Trade:  S&W 10-5 Rare 2" Barrel on Round Butt Frame Combo + Extras
postcontent: In excellent condition and has barely any rounds through it. Blued with color case hardened action and wearing Pachmayr Gripper Grips. Fires and fuctions flawlessly. Still as tight as new. Except for the grips its all orginal. Traditional DA/SA six round medium sized "snub nose". Production date or 1973. Has all the features of a classic S&W revolver like a pinned barrel, hammer mounted firing pin, pre MIM parts and of course its pre lock. The 2" barrel paired to the round butt frame is the desirable less common pairing most are on a square butt frame. Was rated in its day for beyond the modern equivalent of +P. Comes with a HKS speed loader, new ambi IWB/OWB soft holster and a 40rd box of Remington SJHP. Makes a great addtion if your a collector or its still perfct for EDC or home use. Only trading/selling because I have a couple other medium size 38s I have more of a sentimental attachment to and want something else to change things up. Transfer on EFA10 or at a FFL. title: For Sale/Trade:  Richard Tingler’s Custom knives – rjtingler@comcast.net
location: BEL AIR - ABERDEEN - CHURCHVILLE, Baltimore, Maryland
postcontent:
Richard Tingler’s Custom knives – REDACTED
Quality hunting, combat & survival knives.
Unique designs by: Richard Tingler!
I have been making Knives & Custom Guns since I was 16.
I only sold locally and on eBay but Since the Gun Law are changing All the time, I am now focusing on my knives instead of guns. Mine are made extra heavy duty and of the highest quality and Getting better all the time! I use Damascus steel “352 layers or more of 1095 steel and 15N20 Steel “. Also solid D2 steel and every once in awhile I am asked to use 1095 or 5160 & SUP9 STEEL. Others upon request if needed.
See My Face Book Page – Richard Tingler’s Custom knives
PLEASE LIKE & SHARE!

Please Email me Directly ( REDACTED) if you have any questions or want to design a knife for a special purpose or tell me a “TYPE” you’re looking for and I’ll send you pictures of what I have made and ready to sell. I make Hunting-Fighting-Survival-Swords-Machetes & the most authentic “Book Of Eli Machete”in D2 steel also have my version of the “Tracker Knife” and RAMBO“ONE” in Damascus

Damascus steel

This blade is hand forged with 1095 and 15n20 high and low carbon high nickel steel. This blade is about 58 hrc on Rockwell scale. This will hold an edge and keep it’s sharpness for a long time. Ideal for a long lasting sharp cutting edge when used on tough cutting jobs.


D2 STEEL

D2 is sometimes called a "semi-stainless". It has fairly high chrome content (12%), but not high enough to classify it as stainless. It is more stain resistant than the carbon steels however, it has excellent wear resistance. D2 is much tougher than the premium stainless steels like ATS-34, but not as tough as many of the other non-stainless steels. The combination of great wear resistance, almost-stainlessness, and good toughness make it a great choice for a number of machete & knife styles. Bob Dozier is one maker who uses D2-steel. Benchmade Company has begun using D2 in its Axis AFCK also.

I have sold world wide - at this point about seven (7) other countries. And almost every customer has come back and bought more from me. Two (2) customer has bought about ten (10) knives threw the years and one has bought over fifteen (15) from me.  

For the person on here “CLAIMING” to have the best knives and all others on here our junk compared to yours well let’s go blade to blade. We can take your knife and my knife blade edge to blade edge and then we can take a sledge hammer to the top one and the one that ends up with the most damage pays for the other one.
So let see go ahead and but “YOUR” junk on the edge and see what on here is REALLY BETTER! Oh and stop stealing designs off of mine will you!

Will Ship!

title: For Sale/Trade:  1918 Remington mosin nagant
postcontent: Up for sale or trade like the title says is a 1918 dated remington nagant. Just testing the waters with this rare rifle to see what else is out there. This rifle is in extremely good shape for being almost a hundred years old. The guns bluing is faded and the stock has scratches  but it is original and not sporterized in the slightest bit, no cracks either. The gun is 100 percent original and all but 100 percent remington stamped. The marks ive seen with the R in a circle is butt plate, trigger, trigger guard, floor plate, receiver/barrel, entire bolt is stamped remington, sight and barrel bands. I might be missing one but cant think of it. The only thing this rifle is missing is the bayonet and top hand guard if it had one at all. The stock is walnut and appears to be original remington. This gun has the infamous "five dice" mark on the left of the receiver and has a Spanish sling hanger. Im not certain if this was a Spanish civil war rifle or not. It is not numbers matching like typical Spanish civil war rifles and bolt has no serial number. If interested I can send detailed photos to your email as I cannot get photos to load on this post. Please email me any questions, concerns or offers. Thanks.

title: For Sale:  AMMO 9MM, 338 LAPUA, .40 S&W, .45 ACP, 17 HMR, 22 WMR, .357
postcontent: AMMO DEALS!!!! Remington UMC Ammo 9MM Target Ammo FMJ 1000 Round Bulk Pack $229.99 THATS LESS THAN .23 A ROUND!!!!!!!!!Jacketed Soft-point (JSP): This type of ammunition was designed to fill the niche between full-metal jacket and hollow point ammunition, the tip of the round is exposed lead with the rest being copper jacketed providing better expansion than a normal full-metal jacket, and providing better penetration than a hollow point. Balistically they perform very similar to a normal round, providing a similar accuracy and performance to a non-jacketed bullet. The design of the JSP round makes it ideal for states where hollow point rounds are restricted, and where the desired penetration is not found from hollow points. However, due to the in-between nature of the JSP when compared to hollow point or full-metal jacket makes it perform less than desirably than either of those rounds in their respective environs.Jacketed Hollow Point (JHP): Jacketed Hollow-Point ammunition is designed to expand on impact with a target, causing it to expend more of its energy than if it went through the target. This has the effect of not passing through whatever you are shooting and hitting something behind it, as it will expend its energy faster than a traditional round or a full-metal jacket round. There is a trade off for this, a hollow point will not achieve the same penetration of either full-metal jacket rounds or jacketed soft-point rounds, and have trouble defeating barriers.Full-Metal Jacket (FMJ): The full-metal jacket round consists of a soft-metal core, usually consisting of lead, encased in a metal jacket-such as gilding metal, cupronickel or a steel alloy. This jacketing will surround usually the front and sides of the bullet, leaving the back of the round uncovered lead. This round has a higher muzzle velocity than plain lead and leaves behind less fouling in the bore, creating an easier clean up after shooting.

title: For Sale:  Trijicon Acog Scam Alert!!!
postcontent: This optic was posted on here being sold for $900 as a "TRIJICON ACOG SIGHT". Having owned several real Trijicon ACOGs, i can tell right away that this is a fake. Notice there are no raised letters on the right side of the optic that should read "Trijicon ACOG". There is also no model number right underneath where the Trijicon markings should be, near the base of the scope. There is also no "Made in USA" markings. On top of all that, the finish appears to be a bit shiny instead of the flat rough finish on a real Trijicon ACOG. I contacted the seller to request additional pictures, which only revealed everything i listed. When i asked if it was a clone, i simply got no reply. PLEASE DO YOURSELF A FAVOR AND DO YOUR RESEARCH BEFORE GIVING AWAY YOUR MONEY.

title: For Sale/Trade:  SOLD Pending transactions! NOW FOR SALE: BETTER THAN AN AK47, 74, OR AK VARIANT - TABBED AND WITH MAGS AND AMMO!
location: Between Charleston and Goosecreek, Charleston, South Carolina
postcontent:
UPDATE: Sold pending transaction!

now for sale! $615 or best offer.

In case you haven't heard or read, production of the VZ58 / VZ2008 has stopped and they aren't importing any more of these into America. The Czechs have moved on to a new main rifle. They are selling for $800 to $1000 in Canada, and in a couple years or less will fetch those prices here. 
Read reviews on why the VZ2008 beats the AK if you're not sure why. Outstanding rifle!

ASK FOR MORE PICS!

I have a VZ2008 with 4 magazines, each loaded with 30 rounds (120 rounds total) and comes with a great condition ammo pouch (with belt loops and shoulder strap). This rifle shoots accurately and functions perfectly.  

-I removed the slant break (which should never be on a semi-auto) and put a plain thread protector on which reduced felt recoil. (Will include slant break if desired)

-I have had the bolt-carrier tabbed, which means the shooter will never have to worry about any trigger "gremlin" problem popping up (although I never experienced this even before it was added). All semi-auto VZ2008/VZ58s had the tab until it was patented by Czechpoint a few years ago (yes, the $1,250 Czechpoint VZs are tabbed like this one). The tab was done expertly, and I can provide pics if interested. 

-Also (forgot to mention earlier), I put one of the eBay heat shields in the handguard to reduce heat. Can be easily removed but just an added perk.

Originally wanted to trade for an FAL or L1A1 but none were offered, so I'm going to sell this baby to put the money toward an FAL.

Thanks for looking!

P.S. Leather was added by me to the foreguard just to look cool (give it a kind of rebel look). Can be unwrapped if desired, I used no glue or anything like that.
